text:
Alexandrovna muttered, half-conscious of the moment. 

Laughter erupted around her. Dounia frowned, remembering the past. 

Pulcheria Alexandrovna felt relief wash over her. 

Razumihin beamed, excitement bubbling within him. 

“Now I can serve you both!” he thought. 

Raskolnikov sat still, sullen and indifferent. 

Dounia approached him. 

“What did Svidrigaïlov say?” 

“He wants to see you,” Raskolnikov replied. 

Pulcheria Alexandrovna gasped. 

“On no account! How dare he offer money!” 

Raskolnikov recounted the conversation, his tone dry.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The characters experience a mix of relief and tension following the decision to end Dounia's engagement to Luzhin, revealing their differing emotional responses.
